Sentencas: The plate-fin heat exchanger (PFHE) is the core equipment used to achieve the high effi-ciency of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), however, the issues of high-performance brazed joints in the manufacturing of the PFHE have been a challenge due to the poor mechanical properties.
Titulo: Brazing manufacturing technology of plate-fin heat exchanger for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study proposes a brazing manufacturing technology of isothermal solidi-fication with the optimized post bonding heat treatment strategy, to synergistically improve the strength-ductility property and homogenize microstructure of brazed joints, aiming at guaranteeing the high energy efficiency of SOFC.
Titulo: Brazing manufacturing technology of plate-fin heat exchanger for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results show that brazing at 1065 degrees C for 25 min achieves the complete isothermal solidification and an intermetallic-free joint centerline with numerous borides generating in the diffusion-affected zone.
Titulo: Brazing manufacturing technology of plate-fin heat exchanger for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Solution treatment then dissolves large quantities of acicular and blocky borides.
Titulo: Brazing manufacturing technology of plate-fin heat exchanger for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The uniformity of grain size and kernel average misorientation distribution is also improved due to recrys-tallization, which becomes more pronounced after solution aging treatment.
Titulo: Brazing manufacturing technology of plate-fin heat exchanger for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, solution aging treatment results in an improvement in the ultimate tensile strength of the brazed joint, which is more prominent than that after solution treatment.
Titulo: Brazing manufacturing technology of plate-fin heat exchanger for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the increase in elongation after solution aging treatment is smaller than after solution treat-ment, while still much higher than the as-brazed joint due to the dissolution of boride precipitates and growth of twin boundaries.
Titulo: Brazing manufacturing technology of plate-fin heat exchanger for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results demonstrate that the proposed brazing manufacturing technology not only homogenizes microstructure, but also signifi-cantly improves strength and ductility, further promoting the long-life operation of SOFC.(c) 2022
Titulo: Brazing manufacturing technology of plate-fin heat exchanger for solid oxide fuel cells
